Description_lang: Ignite an ally, inflicting $o1 Fire damage over $d. If the target dies while affected by Soul Ignition, they explode inflicting $369215s1 Fire damage to all enemies within $369215A1 yards.
AuraDescription_lang: $w1 Fire damage every inflicted every $t1 sec.This creature will explode on death, dealing $369215s1 Fire damage to enemies within $369215A1 yards.
